controller

Class LoginSceneController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AbstractSceneController
      • controller.LoginSceneController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LoginSceneControllerInterface, javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class LoginSceneController
extends AbstractSceneController
implements LoginSceneControllerInterface

    The LoginSceneController is the controller for the login interface. It delegates the control of the login.

    It inherits from AbstractSceneController.
    And it implements the methods from the LoginSceneControllerInterface.
